name: Down Memory Lane (Alberto Merletti)
description:
--- Overview ---

Live a horror survival experience inside an orphanage populated by monsters and memories of the past.

Travel between the various floors thanks to the elevator and the help of two will-o'-the-wisps (your guiding spirits), in search of a lost child.

But be careful to preserve both of the two flames.

Collect letters, diary pages, strange blue or red pills, get to know Nari, Mi-Sun, Dokkaebi, Miho and Kumi and metaphorically experience the difficulties of a person with bipolar disorder.

--- The Project ---

Down Memory Lane is a game developed by a group of students of Politecnico di Torino.

The students who partecipated in this project are:

  • Alberto Merletti
  • Laura Cossu
  • Edoardo Maglio
  • Massimiliano Pellegrino
  • Francesca Centonze
  • Stefano Tagliente

  1. Unzip the downloaded package
  2. Run the game
  3. Enjoy ;)
